title: BLD Algorithm Database
description: BLDDB (blddb.net) is a comprehensive Rubik’s Cube Blindfolded algorithm database including 3‑style corner (all buffers), 3‑style edge (all buffers), corner twist, edge flip, etc. It provides many options for each case, so the users can select algorithm based on their own preference.

features.title: What's New?
features.paragraph: In Version 2, we've made significant improvements to enhance users' experience.

feature1.title: Streamlined Navigation
feature1.paragraph: We've optimized our navigation for a smoother and more intuitive experience, ensuring that you can find what you need quickly and easily.

feature2.title: Dark Mode Support
feature2.paragraph: We've added a dark mode option to reduce eye strain and provide a more comfortable viewing experience, especially in low-light environments.

feature3.title: Direct Linking to Specific Cases
feature3.paragraph: We've introduced the ability to link directly to specific cases, making it easy to share and reference with others. For example: /corner?position=UFR-UFL-UBL&mode=manmade

feature4.title: Wildcard Matching Support
feature4.paragraph: We recently launched support for wildcard matching, which allows users to see a complete set of cases at once. For example: /corner?position=UFR-UFL-*&mode=manmade

feature5.title: Easy Maintenance and Scalability
feature5.paragraph: Version 2 is designed for easy maintenance, featuring a clean codebase built with Next.js and Tailwind CSS.

feature6.title: Enhancements and Compatibility
feature6.paragraph: We've resolved several legacy bugs and implemented significant updates that were challenging in Version 1, while ensuring compatibility with the previous version.

sheets.title: Algorithm Sheets
sheets.hint: These are BLD algorithm sheets used in the manmade mode of BLDDB. You can sort them by the first line to organize them by name, 3BLD time, or 4BLD time. If you'd like to add your own sheet to this collection, please add the link to the relevant json file on GitHub. You can also reach out to me via email at nbwzx@126.com or on Discord at nbwzx#4869.
sheets.name: Name

corner.title: 3-Style Corner
corner.hint: Please enter 3 letter pairs (buffer-position1-position2) you want to query (eg. JAD)

edge.title: 3-Style Edge
edge.hint: Please enter 3 letter pairs (buffer-position1-position2) you want to query (eg. ACG)

twists.title: Corner Twist
twists.hint: Please set the corner twist condition (solved if empty)

flips.title: Edge Flip
flips.hint: Please enter the 2 positions you want to flip

parity.title: 3BLD Parity
parity.hint: Please enter the parity you want to solve

ltct.title: LTCT & T2C
ltct.hint:
Edge swap is always UF-UR.
For LTCT inquiry, select first and second drop-down lists.
For T2C inquiry, select first and third drop-down lists.

wing.title: Wing
wing.hint: Please enter 3 letter pairs (buffer-position1-position2) you want to query (eg. ACG)

xcenter.title: X-center
xcenter.hint: Please enter 3 letter pairs (buffer-position1-position2) you want to query (eg. JAB)

tcenter.title: +-center
tcenter.hint: Please enter 3 letter pairs (buffer-position1-position2) you want to query (eg. ACF)

midge.title: Midge
midge.hint: Please enter 3 letter pairs (buffer-position1-position2) you want to query (eg. ACG)

donate.title: Donate

general.title: General
general.showThumbPosition: Show thumb position in the table

manmade.title: Manmade
manmade.show3BldAlgsUnderSecs: Show 3BLD algs by authors with 3BLD single under ... seconds
manmade.show4BldAlgsUnderSecs: Show BigBLD algs by authors with 4BLD single under ... seconds

checker.title: Algorithm Checker
checker.hint: Please enter your Google Sheet URL for checking. It should be a 2D table with the first row and the first column containing position information.
checker.notice: Notice: Color Pink means the algorithm is not matched with the case; Color Green means the algorithm is matched with the inverse case.
